isEnabled.label: Enable OBS Scene Switcher
isEnabled.tooltip: Enable this Checkbox if you want to activate the Scene Switcher

obsSceneInMenu.label: Scene - In Menu
obsSceneInMenu.tooltip:
Scene which activates when you're in the Menu.
Leave this field empty if you don't want the script to automatically switch to this scene.

obsSceneInGame.label: Scene - In Game
obsSceneInGame.tooltip:
Scene which activates when you're ingame.
Leave this field empty if you don't want the script to automatically switch to this scene.

obsSceneInReplay.label: Scene - In Replay
obsSceneInReplay.tooltip:
Scene which activates when you are in a Replay.
Leave this field empty if you don't want the script to automatically switch to this scene.

isCasterModeEnabled.label: Enable Casting Mode
isCasterModeEnabled.tooltip: Enable this Checkbox if you're casting a tournament and need a different Overlay for Menu / Ingame.

obsSceneCasterInMenu.label: Casting - In Menu
obsSceneCasterInMenu.tooltip:
Scene which activates when you're in menu as caster.
Leave this field empty if you don't want the script to automatically switch to this scene.

obsSceneCasterInGame.label: Casting - In Game
obsSceneCasterInGame.tooltip:
Scene which activates when you're in game as caster.
Leave this field empty if you don't want the script to automatically switch to this scene.

obsSceneCasterInReplay.label: Casting - In Replay
obsSceneCasterInReplay.tooltip:
Scene which activates when you're in a replay as caster.
Leave this field empty if you don't want the script to automatically switch to this scene.
